name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior FullStack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust web applications using **Java**, **TypeScript**, and front-end frameworks such as **Angular** and **ExtJS**. Proficient in **Spring**, **JUnit**, **Maven**, and database management with **MySQL**. Demonstrated expertise in CI/CD practices utilizing **Jenkins** and **GitLab** for efficient software delivery. Strong capability in implementing automated testing with **Cucumber**, **Selenium**, and **Playwright**. Knowledgeable in cloud technologies, notably **AWS**, as well as container orchestration with **Kubernetes** and **Docker**. Proven success in collaborating on complex projects with a focus on delivering high-quality software solutions for esteemed organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, while continually optimizing performance and scalability.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and deployed robust backend services utilizing **Java** and **Spring** frameworks to enhance user-centric applications and improve web functionalities.
Engineered front-end solutions with **TypeScript**, **Angular**, and **ExtJS** for dynamic and responsive user interfaces, increasing user engagement by **30%**.
Integrated **MySQL** for efficient data management, achieving query performance improvement by **25%** through optimized database design.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitLab**, boosting deployment efficiency and minimizing system outages by **40%**.
Automated testing processes using **JUnit**, **Cucumber**, and **Selenium**, achieving a test coverage rate of **95%**.
Orchestrated containerized applications using **Docker** and managed microservices with **Kubernetes** to ensure high availability and scalability of services.
Utilized cloud platforms like **AWS** to deploy applications, manage resources, and leverage services, leading to reduced operational costs by **20%**.
Conducted code reviews and collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure best practices in software development and adherence to project timelines.

Utilized **Java** and **TypeScript** to develop robust web applications, enhancing user experience and ensuring seamless functionality across platforms.
Leveraged **Angular** and **Spring** frameworks to create responsive interfaces and server-side components, improving application load times by **25%**.
Implemented automated testing strategies using **JUnit**, **Cucumber**, and **Selenium** to achieve over **90%** code coverage and boost deployment reliability.
Managed CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **GitLab**, facilitating smoother deployment cycles and reducing deployment time by **40%**.
Maintained and optimized relational databases with **MySQL**, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval for high-traffic applications handling up to **100,000** transactions per day.
Utilized **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to orchestrate containerized applications, enabling rapid scalability and high availability in cloud environments on **AWS**.
Integrated monitoring and logging solutions such as **Humio** and **Honeycomb** for performance tracking and troubleshooting, enhancing system reliability and speed of issue resolution.
Collaborated with multi-disciplinary teams to ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices, successfully executing project deliverables on time.

- Developed full-stack applications using **Java**, **TypeScript**, and **Angular**, enhancing user experience with interactive interfaces.
- Integrated backend services with **Spring** and **MySQL**, ensuring robust data management and high availability with systems handling over **1M transactions** monthly.
- Collaborated with design teams to create responsive web applications leveraging **AngularJS** and **ExtJS**, significantly improving user engagement metrics by **30%**.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins** and **GitLab**, reducing deployment times by **50%** and increasing reliability.
- Delivered automated testing solutions using **JUnit**, **Cucumber**, and **Selenium**, achieving test coverage of **95%** for critical components.
- Deployed applications in cloud environments utilizing **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, and **Docker**, ensuring scalable and efficient resource management.
- Monitored application performance and logs using **Humio** and **Honeycomb**, aiding in rapid troubleshooting and performance tuning, resulting in **20%** reduction in downtime.
